The novel oxygenated chalcone, 2,4-dimethoxy-4′-butoxychalcone, exhibits potent activity against human malaria parasite Plasmodium falciparum in vitro and rodent parasites Plasmodium berghei and Plasmodium yoelii in vivo . J Infect Dis 1997; 176: 1327– 33. 9359735
